intro: Orbea araysiana, commonly known as the Red-veined Ice Plant, is a succulent plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, cylindrical stems that store water, allowing it to thrive in arid environments. Its flowers are typically bright red or orange, with intricate patterns that attract pollinators. Orbea araysiana is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
